comment:
@MsAmyMacPherson Notice of Appeal. The original suit was brought by Levant.
This isn't what Levant says it is. Trudeau isn't suing Rebel. It is appealing the courts verdict probably for some narrow technical reason to overturn what I consider to be bad precedent.
